text: These are the list of personnel changes in the NBA from the 1977–78 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 8, 1977 to June 30, 1978), see the links below ==References== *NBA Transactions at NBA.com *1977-78 NBA Transactions| Basketball-Reference.com Transactions Category:NBA transactions
title: List of 1977–78 NBA season transactions
